sermons.title: The Danger Of Loving A Theological System More Than The Savior
sermons.description: The message, “The Danger Of Loving A Theological System More Than The Savior (Matthew 22:37-40; 1 Corinthians 8:1-3)” was delivered by Dr. Akin on September 17, 2003 during chapel at The Southern Baptist Theological Seminary in Lousiville, Kentucky.
